data.title: Basketball player Chauncey Billups of the Detroit Pistons makes free throw shots 88 percent of the time Find the probability that he misses his first shot and makes the second?
data.meta_description:
10.56%
The probability that he misses his first shot is 12%. The
probability that he makes the second shot is 88%. The probability
of missing the first shot and making the second shot is 12% * 88%,
or 0.12*0.88*100.
data.text:
10.56%

The probability that he misses his first shot is 12%. The probability that he makes the second shot is 88%. The probability of missing the first shot and making the second shot is 12% * 88%, or 0.12*0.88*100.

What is the crime rate in Detroit?

In 2012 Detroit had the highest crime rate in a city of its size in the United States. There is an estimate 2000 crimes for every 100,000 people.

What is the most dangerous city in the world?

If you want to be realistic, Detroit. If not, most likely to be danger city

What does 187 in Detroit 187 television show mean?

California Penal Code for Homicide. Detroit however is not located in California. In my opinion this is poor choice for a title, but "187" was popularized by West Coast rap in the early 90s, and is synonymous with murder. The show has subsequently been canceled.
